loading.title: Scanning Web Server
loading.scanning: Scanning servers on the local network...

noServers.message: No active servers found on the network

settings.autoOpenIfSingleResult: Auto Open If Only 1 Server Found

unsafe.title: Unsafe Port
unsafe.message: You are trying to scan servers using ports that are not allowed by the system
unsafe.sub-message: Please scan with a different port and restart the application.
